id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin to use LEDC on. Can only be GPIO0-GPIO33.

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#configuration-variables)*

frequency.docs:
**float**: At which frequency to run the LEDC channel’s timer. Defaults to 1000Hz.

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**int**: Manually set the [LEDC channel](https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-idf/en/latest/api-reference/peripherals/ledc.html#configure-channel) to use. Two adjacent channels share the same timer. Defaults to an automatic selection.

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#configuration-variables)*

phase_angle.docs:
**float**: Set a phase angle to the other channel of this timer. Range 0-360°, defaults to 0°

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the LEDC output to change.

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#output-ledc-set-frequency-action)*

frequency.docs:
**[templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable), float**: The frequency to set in hertz.

*See also: [ESP32 LEDC Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#output-ledc-set-frequency-action)*

set_frequency.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) allows you to manually change the frequency of an LEDC channel at runtime. Use cases include controlling a passive buzzer (for pitch control).

*See also: [`output.ledc.set_frequency` Action](https://esphome.io/components/output/ledc.html#output-ledc-set-frequency-action)*
